title: 9Acres near Southern highway
details:
9 Acres land is for sale near Galanigama interchange and Horana-Colombo road.
See the map for the location.

• Easy access to Southern Highway Road (3 mins from Galanigama interchange)
• Easy access to Colombo – Horana Road (1km)
• Container Truck access to the land (wide road)
• Carpet road to the land
• 3 phase electricity
• Pipe-Borne water supplied by National Water Board

Selling for : Factories, Storage, warehouses or similar (not for land sales)

Selling less than 9Acres can be also discussed.
